rows.label: xs01070100_MSG0001
rows.name: This is the BLADE Scout Console.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01070100_MSG0002
rows.name:
It's indispensable for completing missions
that are too difficult to do alone.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01070100_MSG0003
rows.name: Since you're not a BLADE member yet,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01070100_MSG0004
rows.name: you might not understand the importance of this console.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01070100_MSG0005
rows.name: But you know, in order to achieve a wide variety of missions,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01070100_MSG0006
rows.name: you need the help of members with specialized knowledge and skills.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01070100_MSG0007
rows.name:
At times like that, you can use this console
to scout the members you need.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01070100_MSG0008
rows.name: Completing tough missions by helping each other out![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01070100_MSG0009
rows.name:
That kind of amazing organization,
the BLADE is![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01070100_MSG0011
rows.name:
Huh? Did I seem like that?
I didn't mean to at all, but[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01070100_MSG0012
rows.name:
Fufu. That's right.
Let's just leave it at that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01070100_MSG0015
rows.name:
We're heading to an area with shops that provide
top safety and peace of mind![ST:wait ]
